name: Seiga Kaku's Wicked Wall-Zips
description:
Description

Travers several short stages by zipping through the walls in this action puzzle game. Press 'z' and press yourself against a 'wall' (or something else) to zip through it, defeating any enemy that happened to be unfortunate enough to be in your path.

Controls
  • Arrow keys for movement
  • 'z' to zip through walls (this was the original meaning of 'z', before the Zen Buddhist appropriated the letter and before the Western magicians invented their lazers.)
  • 'r' to reset the level.
  • ESC to pause
Attribution and usage rights

See attribution.txt for a list of assets used to make this game, and their licenses.
